ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 81
ygData.msgSnippet: WICKED!! I haven t recharged mine yet) I AM SO HAPPY!!! Xillith, Rallos Zek
ygData.messageBody:
WICKED!!

I haven't recharged mine yet)

I AM SO HAPPY!!!

Xillith, Rallos Zek


>From: Chip Paul <cpaul@...>
>Reply-To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
>To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [eq_shadowknights] Digest Number 81
>Date: Thu, 07 Oct 1999 09:45:46 -0500
>
>Xillith ofNeriak wrote:
> >
> > THE RING:
> >
> > In a phrase...kicks ass.
> >
> > One charge of bind affinity, rechargeable by a merchant in the lodge of
>the
> > dead. 80plat. I do not recall the name of the merchant, but if you ask
> > them "what is the ring of the dead" one of them will offer to recharge
>it.
> > The recharger is a female one the first floor of the Lodge of the Dead.
>Now
> > if it sounds like a DE only thing, you're right. The ring is SK, Necro
>and
> > dark elf only. (sorry all you Humans Ogres and Trolls, you get to walk
>a
> > little farther from bind point....hehe)
> >
>
>Actually, it is only 10 gold to have it recharged. This is the
>price she quotes me, and recharges it for that. BTW, all you
>other SKs out there, rememeber to target yourself before you click
>on it. I messed up once and was really irked.
>
>Xilith (one l)
><< text3.html >>
